Package eu.nerdz.api

eu.nerdz.api is a NERDZ API specification which aims of being simple and easy to use, and good for any purpose.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Application
    Interface representing a basic NerdzApi application.

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadStatusException
    Indicates that some request involving a JSON response has returned a JSONObject containing a status different than "ok".
    ContentException
    Raised when the application encounters wrong responses or content.
    HttpException
    Represents the reception of a bad HTTP code.
    LoginException
    Represents a wrong login.

Package eu.nerdz.api Description

eu.nerdz.api is a NERDZ API specification which aims of being simple and easy to use, and good for any purpose. This package only contains interfaces and exceptions for common events.
